# kion_app_config (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# Configure Kion application settings
# Note: This resource manages global application configuration.
# Only specify the settings you want to manage; unspecified settings will be left unchanged.

resource "kion_app_config" "main" {
  # Budget and cost management settings
  budget_mode                        = true
  allocation_mode                    = true
  enforce_funding                    = true
  enforce_funding_sources           = true
  cost_savings_enabled              = true
  cost_savings_allow_terminate      = false
  cost_savings_post_token_life_hours = 24

  # Organization and UI settings
  default_org_chart_view    = "policy"
  all_users_see_ou_names   = true

  # Feature enablement
  forecasting_enabled        = true
  resource_inventory_enabled = true
  reserved_instances_enabled = true
  event_driven_enabled      = false

  # API key management
  app_api_key_creation_enabled = true
  app_api_key_lifespan        = 90  # 90 days
  app_api_key_limit           = 5   # 5 keys per user

  # AWS configuration
  aws_access_key_creation_enabled = true
  supported_aws_regions = [
    "us-east-1",
    "us-west-2",
    "eu-west-1",
    "ap-southeast-1"
  ]

  # Permission and access settings
  allow_custom_permission_schemes  = true
  cloud_rule_group_ownership_only  = false
  idms_groups_as_viewers_default   = false

  # SMTP configuration for email notifications
  smtp_enabled     = true
  smtp_host        = "smtp.company.com"
  smtp_port        = 587
  smtp_from        = "kion-notifications@company.com"
  smtp_username    = "kion-service"
  smtp_password    = var.smtp_password  # Use a variable for sensitive data
  smtp_skip_verify = false

  # Debug and development settings
  saml_debug = false
}

# Example with minimal configuration - only enabling key features
resource "kion_app_config" "minimal" {
  # Only configure essential settings
  budget_mode         = true
  enforce_funding     = true
  forecasting_enabled = true
  
  # Basic SMTP for notifications
  smtp_enabled = true
  smtp_host    = "localhost"
  smtp_port    = 25
  smtp_from    = "noreply@company.com"
}

# Variable for sensitive SMTP password
variable "smtp_password" {
  description = "SMTP server password for email notifications"
  type        = string
  sensitive   = true
}

# Outputs to show current configuration
output "app_config_summary" {
  description = "Summary of key application configuration settings"
  value = {
    budget_mode_enabled    = kion_app_config.main.budget_mode
    cost_savings_enabled   = kion_app_config.main.cost_savings_enabled
    default_chart_view     = kion_app_config.main.default_org_chart_view
    smtp_configured        = kion_app_config.main.smtp_enabled
    supported_aws_regions  = length(kion_app_config.main.supported_aws_regions)
    api_key_limit_per_user = kion_app_config.main.app_api_key_limit
  }
}

# Example of importing existing app-config
# terraform import kion_app_config.existing app-config

# Example of using data source to reference current settings
data "kion_app_config" "current" {}

output "current_vs_managed" {
  description = "Comparison of current settings vs managed settings"
  value = {
    current_budget_mode = data.kion_app_config.current.budget_mode
    managed_budget_mode = kion_app_config.main.budget_mode
    settings_match      = data.kion_app_config.current.budget_mode == kion_app_config.main.budget_mode
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `all_users_see_ou_names` (Boolean) Indicates whether all users can see the names of OU's in the organization chart.
- `allocation_mode` (Boolean) Indicates if allocation mode is enabled in the application.
- `allow_custom_permission_schemes` (Boolean) Indicates whether custom permission schemes are allowed or not.
- `app_api_key_creation_enabled` (Boolean) Indicates if App API Key creation is enabled.
- `app_api_key_lifespan` (Number) Indicates the lifespan of App API Keys in days.
- `app_api_key_limit` (Number) Indicates the max amount of App API Keys per user.
- `aws_access_key_creation_enabled` (Boolean) Indicates whether AWS access keys creation is enabled.
- `budget_mode` (Boolean) Indicates if budget mode is enabled in the application.
- `cloud_rule_group_ownership_only` (Boolean) Indicates if cloud rules are restricted to User Group ownership only. Setting this to true will remove all users from cloud rules. This cannot be undone.
- `cost_savings_allow_terminate` (Boolean) Indicates whether resource termination is allowed in-app.
- `cost_savings_enabled` (Boolean) Indicates whether Cost Savings is enabled or not.
- `cost_savings_post_token_life_hours` (Number) Post token life (hours) for Cloud Custodian webhook actions to execute.
- `default_org_chart_view` (String) Defines the default organization chart view.
- `enforce_funding` (Boolean) Indicates whether spend plans or budgets must be created on all projects.
- `enforce_funding_sources` (Boolean) Indicates whether every project should have a funding source.
- `event_driven_enabled` (Boolean) Indicates whether event driven is enabled or not.
- `forecasting_enabled` (Boolean) Indicates whether forecasting is enabled or not.
- `idms_groups_as_viewers_default` (Boolean) Indicates whether, when new groups are created via IDMS, the group will be set as a viewer by default.
- `reserved_instances_enabled` (Boolean) Indicates whether reserved instances are enabled or not.
- `resource_inventory_enabled` (Boolean) Indicates whether resource inventory is enabled or not.
- `saml_debug` (Boolean) Indicates whether SAML debugging is enabled or not.
- `smtp_enabled` (Boolean) Indicates whether SMTP is enabled or not.
- `smtp_from` (String) The SMTP from address.
- `smtp_host` (String) The SMTP host.
- `smtp_password` (String, Sensitive) The SMTP password.
- `smtp_port` (Number) The SMTP port.
- `smtp_skip_verify` (Boolean) Indicates if the app should skip SMTP verification.
- `smtp_username` (String) The SMTP username.
- `supported_aws_regions` (List of String) The list of supported AWS regions.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
